what: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data

text: imfweo provides easy access International Monetary Fundâ€™s World Economic Outlook (WEO) database R. minimum viable product heavy development.

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: Download process WEO data releases List available countries, indicators, releases Extract specific series analysis Consistent interface tidy data output

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: can install development version imfweo GitHub :

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: can get WEO data either downloading specific series selected countries (weo_get()) downloading complete WEO releases (weo_bulk()). Get specific indicators selected countries: Download complete WEO release:
code: library(imfweo)  # Get GDP growth and inflation for G7 countries weo_get(   series = c("NGDP_RPCH", "PCPIPCH"),  # Real GDP growth and inflation   countries = c("USA", "GBR", "DEU", "FRA", "ITA", "JPN", "CAN"),   start_year = 2015 ) #> â„¹ Available series: NGDP_R, NGDP_RPCH, NGDP, NGDPD, PPPGDP, NGDP_D, NGDPRPC, NGDPRPPPPC, NGDPPC, NGDPDPC, PPPPC, PPPSH, PPPEX, NID_NGDP, NGSD_NGDP, PCPI, PCPIPCH, PCPIE, PCPIEPCH, TM_RPCH, TMG_RPCH, TX_RPCH, TXG_RPCH, LP, GGR, GGR_NGDP, GGX, GGX_NGDP, GGXCNL, GGXCNL_NGDP, GGXONLB, GGXONLB_NGDP, GGXWDG, GGXWDG_NGDP, NGDP_FY, BCA, BCA_NGDPD, LUR, GGXWDN, GGXWDN_NGDP, LE, GGSB, GGSB_NPGDP, NGAP_NPGDP #> â„¹ Requested series: NGDP_RPCH, PCPIPCH #> â„¹ Filtered series: NGDP_RPCH, PCPIPCH #> # A tibble: 210 Ã— 7 #>    country_name country_code series_name           units series_code  year value #>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>                 <chr> <chr>       <int> <dbl> #>  1 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2015  0.65 #>  2 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2016  1.04 #>  3 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2017  3.03 #>  4 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2018  2.74 #>  5 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2019  1.91 #>  6 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2020 -5.04 #>  7 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2021  5.29 #>  8 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2022  3.82 #>  9 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2023  1.25 #> 10 Canada       CAN          Gross domestic produâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2024  1.34 #> # â„¹ 200 more rows # Download Spring 2024 WEO weo_bulk(2024, "Spring") #> â„¹ Downloading WEO data... #> â„¹ Processing data... #> # A tibble: 322,437 Ã— 7 #>    country     iso   subject                            units series  year value #>    <chr>       <chr> <chr>                              <chr> <chr>  <int> <dbl> #>  1 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2002  453. #>  2 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2003  493. #>  3 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2004  496. #>  4 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2005  555. #>  5 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2006  585. #>  6 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2007  663. #>  7 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2008  688. #>  8 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2009  830. #>  9 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2010  900. #> 10 Afghanistan AFG   Gross domestic product, constant â€¦ Natiâ€¦ NGDP_R  2011  958. #> # â„¹ 322,427 more rows

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: List available WEO releases: List available countries regions: List available economic indicators:
code: weo_list_releases() #> # A tibble: 36 Ã— 3 #>     year release month   #>    <int> <chr>   <chr>   #>  1  2007 Spring  April   #>  2  2007 Fall    October #>  3  2008 Spring  April   #>  4  2008 Fall    October #>  5  2009 Spring  April   #>  6  2009 Fall    October #>  7  2010 Spring  April   #>  8  2010 Fall    October #>  9  2011 Spring  April   #> 10  2011 Fall    October #> # â„¹ 26 more rows weo_list_countries() #> # A tibble: 196 Ã— 2 #>    country_code country_name        #>    <chr>        <chr>               #>  1 AFG          Afghanistan         #>  2 ALB          Albania             #>  3 DZA          Algeria             #>  4 AND          Andorra             #>  5 AGO          Angola              #>  6 ATG          Antigua and Barbuda #>  7 ARG          Argentina           #>  8 ARM          Armenia             #>  9 ABW          Aruba               #> 10 AUS          Australia           #> # â„¹ 186 more rows # Search for specific countries weo_list_countries("united") #> # A tibble: 3 Ã— 2 #>   country_code country_name         #>   <chr>        <chr>                #> 1 ARE          United Arab Emirates #> 2 GBR          United Kingdom       #> 3 USA          United States weo_list_series() #> # A tibble: 44 Ã— 3 #>    series_code series_name                                      units            #>    <chr>       <chr>                                            <chr>            #>  1 BCA         Current account balance                          U.S. dollars     #>  2 BCA_NGDPD   Current account balance                          Percent of GDP   #>  3 GGR         General government revenue                       National currenâ€¦ #>  4 GGR_NGDP    General government revenue                       Percent of GDP   #>  5 GGSB        General government structural balance            National currenâ€¦ #>  6 GGSB_NPGDP  General government structural balance            Percent of poteâ€¦ #>  7 GGX         General government total expenditure             National currenâ€¦ #>  8 GGXCNL      General government net lending/borrowing         National currenâ€¦ #>  9 GGXCNL_NGDP General government net lending/borrowing         Percent of GDP   #> 10 GGXONLB     General government primary net lending/borrowing National currenâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 34 more rows # Search for GDP-related indicators weo_list_series("gdp") #> # A tibble: 22 Ã— 3 #>    series_code  series_name                                      units           #>    <chr>        <chr>                                            <chr>           #>  1 BCA_NGDPD    Current account balance                          Percent of GDP  #>  2 GGR_NGDP     General government revenue                       Percent of GDP  #>  3 GGSB_NPGDP   General government structural balance            Percent of potâ€¦ #>  4 GGXCNL_NGDP  General government net lending/borrowing         Percent of GDP  #>  5 GGXONLB_NGDP General government primary net lending/borrowing Percent of GDP  #>  6 GGXWDG_NGDP  General government gross debt                    Percent of GDP  #>  7 GGXWDN_NGDP  General government net debt                      Percent of GDP  #>  8 GGX_NGDP     General government total expenditure             Percent of GDP  #>  9 NGAP_NPGDP   Output gap in percent of potential GDP           Percent of potâ€¦ #> 10 NGDP         Gross domestic product, current prices           National curreâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 12 more rows

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: package active development. Current features working may change. Future releases add: Better data validation convenience functions common analyses Improved documentation vignettes Additional data transformation tools

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: imfweo part econdataverse, universe open-source packages designed make working economic data seamless efficient. goal simple: spend less time wrestling data time analyzing . Think econdataverse packages LEGOÂ® pieces - modular tools designed work together perfectly. example, might combine World Bank debt data (using {wbids}) IMF macroeconomic projections package.

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: Download WEO data programmatically Access specific indicators selected countries Get metadata available series countries Return data tidy format ready analysis

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: â€™re working : Standardizing country names across econdataverse packages Creating consistent column names data structures Building tools common economic analyses Making data combination across sources seamless econdataverse packages: {wbids}: World Bank International Debt Statistics âœ… {wbwdi}: World Bank World Development Indicators ðŸš€ coming soon! mission unclog data bottleneck economic analysis. making data access cleaning efficient consistent, enable policymakers researchers focus matters: using data make better decisions world limited resources.

what: Download and Process IMF WEO Data â€” weo_bulk
title: Download and Process IMF WEO Data â€” weo_bulk
text: Download Process IMF WEO Data

title: Download and Process IMF WEO Data â€” weo_bulk
code: weo_bulk(year, release = c("Spring", "Fall"), file_path = NULL, quiet = FALSE)

title: Download and Process IMF WEO Data â€” weo_bulk
text: year Numeric year WEO release (e.g., 2023) release Character numeric: "Spring"/"Fall" 1/2 file_path Optional path save downloaded file quiet Logical: whether suppress messages

title: Download and Process IMF WEO Data â€” weo_bulk
text: tibble containing WEO data long format

title: Get WEO Data â€” weo_get
text: Retrieve data IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) database specific series, countries, years.

title: Get WEO Data â€” weo_get
code: weo_get(series, countries, start_year = 1980, end_year = NULL, release = NULL)

title: Get WEO Data â€” weo_get
text: series Character vector series codes (weo_list_series()) countries Character vector ISO country codes (weo_list_countries()) start_year Numeric: start year (default: 1980) end_year Numeric: end year (default: current year + 5) release Optional list components 'year' 'release' specifying WEO release use. NULL, uses latest available.

title: Get WEO Data â€” weo_get
text: tibble columns: country_code ISO 3-letter country code country_name Country name series_code WEO series code series_name Series name units Units measurement year Year value Value

title: Get WEO Data â€” weo_get
code: # Get GDP growth for selected countries weo_get(   series = "NGDP_RPCH",   countries = c("USA", "GBR", "DEU"),   start_year = 2015 ) #> â„¹ Available series: NGDP_R, NGDP_RPCH, NGDP, NGDPD, PPPGDP, NGDP_D, NGDPRPC, NGDPRPPPPC, NGDPPC, NGDPDPC, PPPPC, PPPSH, PPPEX, NID_NGDP, NGSD_NGDP, PCPI, PCPIPCH, PCPIE, PCPIEPCH, TM_RPCH, TMG_RPCH, TX_RPCH, TXG_RPCH, LP, GGR, GGR_NGDP, GGX, GGX_NGDP, GGXCNL, GGXCNL_NGDP, GGXONLB, GGXONLB_NGDP, GGXWDG, GGXWDG_NGDP, NGDP_FY, BCA, BCA_NGDPD, LUR, GGXWDN, GGXWDN_NGDP, LE, GGSB, GGSB_NPGDP, NGAP_NPGDP #> â„¹ Requested series: NGDP_RPCH #> â„¹ Filtered series: NGDP_RPCH #> # A tibble: 45 Ã— 7 #>    country_name country_code series_name          units series_code  year  value #>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>                <chr> <chr>       <int>  <dbl> #>  1 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2015  1.66  #>  2 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2016  2.29  #>  3 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2017  2.71  #>  4 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2018  1.12  #>  5 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2019  0.993 #>  6 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2020 -4.1   #>  7 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2021  3.67  #>  8 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2022  1.37  #>  9 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2023 -0.264 #> 10 Germany      DEU          Gross domestic prodâ€¦ Percâ€¦ NGDP_RPCH    2024  0.007 #> # â„¹ 35 more rows

what: List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
title: List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
text: Returns tibble available countries regions WEO database.

title: List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
text: pattern Optional character string filter countries name ISO code

title: List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
text: tibble columns: country_code ISO 3-letter country code country_name Full name country

title: List Available WEO Countries â€” weo_list_countries
code: # List all countries weo_list_countries() #> # A tibble: 196 Ã— 2 #>    country_code country_name        #>    <chr>        <chr>               #>  1 AFG          Afghanistan         #>  2 ALB          Albania             #>  3 DZA          Algeria             #>  4 AND          Andorra             #>  5 AGO          Angola              #>  6 ATG          Antigua and Barbuda #>  7 ARG          Argentina           #>  8 ARM          Armenia             #>  9 ABW          Aruba               #> 10 AUS          Australia           #> # â„¹ 186 more rows  # Search for specific countries weo_list_countries("united") #> # A tibble: 3 Ã— 2 #>   country_code country_name         #>   <chr>        <chr>                #> 1 ARE          United Arab Emirates #> 2 GBR          United Kingdom       #> 3 USA          United States

what: List Available IMF WEO Releases â€” weo_list_releases
title: List Available IMF WEO Releases â€” weo_list_releases
text: Returns tibble available WEO releases 2007 onwards. IMF typically releases WEO database twice per year: Spring (April) Fall (October)

title: List Available IMF WEO Releases â€” weo_list_releases
List Available IMF WEO Releases â€” weo_list_releases
text: min_year Minimum year include (default: 2007) max_year Maximum year include (default: current year)

title: List Available IMF WEO Releases â€” weo_list_releases
text: tibble columns: year year release release release name ("Spring" "Fall") month month release ("April" "October")

what: List Available WEO Series (Indicators) â€” weo_list_series
title: List Available WEO Series (Indicators) â€” weo_list_series
text: Returns tibble available series (economic indicators) WEO database.

title: List Available WEO Series (Indicators) â€” weo_list_series
List Available WEO Series (Indicators) â€” weo_list_series
text: pattern Optional character string filter series name code

title: List Available WEO Series (Indicators) â€” weo_list_series
text: tibble columns: series_code WEO subject code (e.g., "NGDP_RPCH") series_name Full name series (e.g., "Gross domestic product, constant prices") units Units measurement
